page.title: 04Shap Road Industrial Estate
page.content: { Shap Road Industrial Estate}covers 5.69 hectares. The project for the new estate started in Autumn 1982. Kendal Borough Council thought of building the new estate and they decided that extending Mintsfeet would have more problems than building a new estate but Mintsfeet still has building potential. All 10 plots have been sold but some firms found their plot was too big and split it in half. There is no overall manager of the estate.{South Lakeland District {Council}built the roads and water mains to get things moving.
